definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: a king of Lachish Jos 10:3, LXX Iefqa, A LXXL Iaf(a)ie.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a son of David 2Sa 5:15 (LXX Iefiev, LXXL Nafeq) = 1Ch 3:7 (LXX Ianoue A Iafie, LXXL Axikam) = 1Ch 14:6 (LXX Ianouou, A Iafie, LXXL Iabeg).

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: on border of Zebulun Jos 19:12, perh. = mod. Yâfa, ½ hour fr. Nazareth, Rob:BR ii. 343 f, but LXX Faggai, Iafayai\ LXXL Iaffie.
